participant_1.background: my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i walk three miles every day. i'm a baby delivery nurse. i love to spend time with my family.

participant_2.background: i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i just got a job working in a gas station. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates.
